Uses of Class
com.opengamma.strata.product.PositionInfo

  • Packages that use PositionInfo 
    Package Description
    com.opengamma.strata.loader.csv
    Loader that reads market data from CSV files.
    com.opengamma.strata.product
    Entity objects describing trades and products in financial markets.
    com.opengamma.strata.product.bond
    Entity objects describing bonds.
    com.opengamma.strata.product.dsf
    Entity objects describing Deliverable Swap Futures (DSFs).
    com.opengamma.strata.product.etd
    Entity objects describing Exchange Traded Derivatives (ETDs).
    com.opengamma.strata.product.index
    Entity objects describing contracts based on rate indices.

    • Uses of PositionInfo in com.opengamma.strata.loader.csv

      Methods in com.opengamma.strata.loader.csv with parameters of type PositionInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default Position PositionCsvInfoResolver.parseEtdFuturePosition​(CsvRow row, PositionInfo info)
      Parses an ETD future position from the CSV row.
      default SecurityPosition PositionCsvInfoResolver.parseEtdFutureSecurityPosition​(CsvRow row, PositionInfo info)
      Parses an ETD future position from the CSV row without using reference data.
      default Position PositionCsvInfoResolver.parseEtdOptionPosition​(CsvRow row, PositionInfo info)
      Parses an ETD future position from the CSV row.
      default SecurityPosition PositionCsvInfoResolver.parseEtdOptionSecurityPosition​(CsvRow row, PositionInfo info)
      Parses an ETD option position from the CSV row without using reference data.
